page.title: 17HALTON FISH FARM
page.content: The Fish Farm which sells tropical,sea water and cold water fish,started as a hobby but soon became a fast growing business.About 600-1000 fish are sold each week.More pond fish are sold in the summer and more tropical fish in the winter.The smallest fish is called "Dwarf Rasbora" The biggest is a "Cat fish" which is 80cm long with whiskers 1metre long.10% of the water in the tanks is changed once a month for tropical fish and every three weeks for sea-water fish.To keep the fish healthy do not over feed and do not put too many fish together.Only eight varieties have live babies, all the rest lay eggs.The owner also keeps a Tarantula and a Garter Snake. Plants and accessories are also sold.
